TopicTitle: IVA props and various 3D-model bits collection.

Articles.Content:
Hello, i am the corporate manager of Hof's. We here at Hof's want to make sure it's easy for people to do IVA's that look good and give people random parts.

What this thread is about is making a collection of props for IVA's, models and animations for a KSP video if you want. Make it a bit easier for new and old kerbal pilots to have fun and spend less time.

I suggest we make a list on stuff the community wants(Dials, buttons, levers, ladders, doors etc.) and collaborate to make them toghether.(Sorry if im bad at making the sentences, im a bit sick so my head is dizzy)

If YOU want to be part of this collab, leave a reply.

If YOU want a specific type of props, leave a reply.

I will compile the information and hope people will make nice looking 3D-models for everyone to use in their creations.(Note: I am not necessarily going to make ALL the stuff you suggest, other people will be working on this too)

Crew------------------

Hofugir: Creator and lead modeler.

------------------------

Request list-------------

-------------------------

I usually go away every other week or so without internet to a place so i wont be able to answer to everything all the time!

Hope you will have good use of this and have fun with it!

UPDATE: Got some time to figure out props i want to make so here is some i completed so far.

Edited October 28, 2013 by Hofugir
Good idea, I have a few props made like generic switches and a landing gear lever, also an action group button panel, I might contribute them to your pack at some time.

It'd be great to see an emergency abort button, something like a big red button, probably.

I could model and texture it, but I am not able to assign functions to iva props , that would be the work of a programmer.

greetings

Themorris
Also, if you want to join in please send me a PM.

A hula girl ( hula kerbal? ) and a kerbal bobble head ( Why isn't that an actual thing? Id totally buy one )

Snack wrappers, pens and other utensils.

..a frozen hotdog.

How do you incorporate these BTW? They just appear in Iva view? Because the reason I say snack wrappers and junk is because I want to see all this floating around inside the cockpit. Then.. if possible have it react with g-forces. How cool would it be to see all this stuff move to the back when you fire engines, then start floating again after the burn. ( be cool if the Iva camera reacted to g's aswell, but that's for another mod another day. )

I been thinking about stuff like this since I've started playing. "Immersion" props.

How do you incorporate these BTW? They just appear in Iva view?

They are 3d models you can add your IVA model. So when you are assembling your IVA in your 3d-modeling software you add these to various places.
